Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Vampie
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Takes wonderful indoor and outdoor photos. The zoom is amazing. I got some awesome pictures of the birds that frequent my bird feeders. Especially the hummingbirds. I also liked all the extras that came with the camera. (spare battery, mini tripod, case, LCD screen protector, 16 GB card and lens cleaning kit. Saved me a lot of money. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: the best camera i've every had
Reviews.Author: Charlene L.
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for 7 months now and love it easy to take pictures I also took all of my grandson's senior portrait's and a few other after seeing his. And this year I  took portraits at our mobile park now all the folks have updated pictures of them self's. for their children. I did buy a good tripod and have software to finish the pictures.

ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Red) BUNDLE with Sony 16GB Card, Spare Battery, Card Reader, Case, Mini Tripod, LCD Screen Protectors, Lens Cleaning Kit, Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
